poly noun [C]
(RELATIONSHIPS)
informal short for
polyamorous : having or relating to the practice of having sexual or romantic relationships with two or more people at the same time: She's poly. Anna, James, and Sorrel are in a poly relationship. Compare
non-monogamous
many: a polytheistic (= believing in many gods) society a polymath (= person who knows a lot about many different subjects.)
